org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.persistence

Interface MapJoinTableContainer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MemoryEstimate
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MapJoinPersistableTableContainer, VectorMapJoinTableContainer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMapJoinTableContainer, HashMapWrapper, HybridHashTableContainer, MapJoinBytesTableContainer, VectorMapJoinFastTableContainer

    public interface MapJoinTableContainer
extends MemoryEstimate

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  MapJoinTableContainer.ReusableGetAdaptor
      Retrieve rows from hashtable key by key, one key at a time, w/o copying the structures for each key.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears the contents of the table.
      MapJoinTableContainer.ReusableGetAdaptor createGetter(MapJoinKey keyTypeFromLoader)
      Creates reusable get adaptor that can be used to retrieve rows from the table based on either vectorized or non-vectorized input rows to MapJoinOperator.
      void dumpMetrics() 
      MapJoinKey getAnyKey() 
      boolean hasSpill()
      Checks if the container has spilled any data onto disk.
      MapJoinKey putRow(org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable currentKey, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable currentValue)
      Adds row from input to the table.
      void seal()
      Indicates to the container that the puts have ended; table is now r/o.
      void setSerde(MapJoinObjectSerDeContext keyCtx, MapJoinObjectSerDeContext valCtx) 
      int size()
      Return the size of the hash table

        getEstimatedMemorySize

        Adds row from input to the table.
        Throws:
        SerDeException
        HiveException

      • seal

        void seal()
        Indicates to the container that the puts have ended; table is now r/o.

      • createGetter

        MapJoinTableContainer.ReusableGetAdaptor createGetter(MapJoinKey keyTypeFromLoader)
        Creates reusable get adaptor that can be used to retrieve rows from the table based on either vectorized or non-vectorized input rows to MapJoinOperator.
        Parameters:
        keyTypeFromLoader - Last key from hash table loader, to determine key type used when loading hashtable (if it can vary).

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears the contents of the table.

      • getAnyKey

      • dumpMetrics

        void dumpMetrics()

      • hasSpill

        boolean hasSpill()
        Checks if the container has spilled any data onto disk. This is only applicable for HybridHashTableContainer.

        int size()
        Return the size of the hash table
